description:

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
We’ve seen major corporate mergers in Hollywood over the past decade. For example, 20th Century Fox was bought by Disney, Paramount just merged with Skydance, and now reports are coming that studios are interested in Warner Bros. Now these reports just got an additional confirmation that tech companies are eager to buy Hollywood movie studios [...]
